directions: Blend first 7 ingredients in processor until finely chopped. Stir in green onions, cilantro and sesame seeds. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate. Bring to room temperature before using.)
*Available at Asian markets, specialty foods stores and some supermarkets.
ingredients: 1/4 cup Asian fermented black beans,* rinsed well, drained
title: Black Bean-Soy Sauce
